gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowInvestmentActivities` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_CashFlowInvestmentActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_CashFlowInvestmentActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestmentActivitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestmentActivitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestmentActivitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestmentActivitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowPensionActivities` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_CashFlowPensionActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_CashFlowPensionActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfCashFlowPensionActivitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfCashFlowPensionActivitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfCashFlowPensionActivitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfCashFlowPensionActivitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetCashFlows` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_NetCashFlows')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_NetCashFlows return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfNetCashFlowsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfNetCashFlowsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfNetCashFlowsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfNetCashFlowsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
